decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

2021161.PA.101 Rev. P01, 2021161.XO101 Rev P02, 2021161.XO.102 Rev. P02, Sett Sample Photos, Heritage Statement (November 2021), Letter dated 9th November 2021

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, the materials to be used in the resurfacing of the existing driveway shall be Marshalls Drivesett Tegula Priora Pennat Grey sett type. The specified setts must be laid in random courses and retained as such thereafter.

REASON: To protect the appearance and character of the conservation area, in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021), policy CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013), and to meet the design guidance set out in the Pinnerwood Park Conservation Area Appraisal and Management Strategy (2009).
description: Alteration existing front driveway, and enlargement of drop kerb, and crossover to create more space. Reduction of part front fence panel to accomodate extended crossover
